body_html:
We should make this clearer on the "Install C" page, but since version 1.2 TensorFlow has not been providing GPU support on macOS.

See release notes for 1.1.0 and some discussion on reddit.

Hope that helps.
body_text:
We should make this clearer on the "Install C" page, but since version 1.2 TensorFlow has not been providing GPU support on macOS.
See release notes for 1.1.0 and some discussion on reddit.
Hope that helps.
body:
We should make this clearer on the "Install C" page, but since version 1.2 TensorFlow has not been providing GPU support on macOS.

See [release notes for 1.1.0](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/releases/tag/v1.1.0) and some [discussion on reddit](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=14577538).

Hope that helps.
